use.flag: Embed data in library binary (Warning: This increases the executable size by about 1Mb unless unneeded language data files are manually removed from the "data" directory before compiling)

pkgmetadata.longdescription:
Configurable Knuth-Liang hyphenation
Uses the UTF8 encoded hyphenation patterns provided by hyph-utf8 from <http://www.ctan.org/tex-archive/language/hyph-utf8>
Usage:
>>> hyphenate english_US "supercalifragilisticexpialadocious" ["su","per","cal","ifrag","ilis","tic","ex","pi","al","ado","cious"]
>>> hyphenate english_US "hyphenation" ["hy","phen","ation"]
>>> hyphenate icelandic "va\240lahei\240avegavinnuverkf\230rageymslusk\250r" ["va\240la","hei\240a","vega","vinnu","verk","f\230ra","geymslu","sk\250r"]
